title: Blueprint, "Lighting Design", ca. 1929
medium:
Blueprint and yellow pencil on white wove paper
Support: white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed at lower right: DWG # 527311-LAMP/DONALD DESKE/145 W. 57TH ST. Inscribed with dimensions, materials throughout Inscribed in yellow pencil with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout
description: Elevation and plan for table lamp; satin aluminum shade in base in "2" shape; horizontal, tubular light underneath aluminum shade. Pull string on base of tubular bulb.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Lighting Design", ca. 1929.
ca. 1929. Blueprint and yellow pencil on white wove paper
Support: white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-229.
